tool_description: Generate lorem ipsum filler text with this easy to use API.
name: Lorem Text Generator
title: Lorem Text Generator

api_list.name: Word
api_list.description: Generate a single random lorem ipsum word.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: How many words would you like? Defaults to 1.

api_list.name: Paragraph
api_list.description: Generates a random lorem ipsum paragraph.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: How many paragraphs would you like? Defaults to 1.

optional_parameters.name: length
optional_parameters.description: How many sentences should be in each paragraph?

api_list.name: Sentence
api_list.description: Generates a random lorem ipsum sentence.

required_parameters.name: length
required_parameters.description: How many words should be in each sentence?

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: How many sentences would you like? Defaults to 1.
